title: arXiv
alt: Both arXiv and archive.org are invaluable projects which, if they didn't exist, we would dismiss as obviously ridiculous and unworkable.
transcript:
[Megan and Ponytail are standing together. Megan is talking to Ponytail.]
Megan: Wait, all the papers in your field are posted as free PDFs on arXiv? That must be killing big science journals, since they charge such huge subscription/publication fees.[Ponytail responds with her arms wide, palms up.]
Ponytail: Nah, we’ve been doing it since the 90s and nobody seems to care.[Megan contemplates, speechless.][Megan slightly raises her arms and Ponytail puts up a hand to shush her.]
Megan: That makes no sense at all!!
Ponytail: Shhh, you’ll jinx it!
